I am scared of dogs.
I rent an apartment.

content.text: Hello, I'm (name). I'm a teacher at the local college.
That's interesting. I'm a 32 year old single woman who wants to be a chef.
That's great! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook anything with vegetables. I'm also really good at making pasta dishes.
I love pasta too! I've been to six countries and have tried all sorts of different pasta dishes.
That's so cool! I've only been to one country, but I'm hoping to travel more in the future.
You should! It's a great way to learn about different cultures.
I agree. I'm also really interested in nature. I love walking in the woods and exploring my local area.
That's great! I have a large garden that I love to spend time in. I grow all sorts of different fruits and vegetables.
That's awesome! I would love to have a garden someday.
You should! It's really rewarding to grow your own food.
Thanks for the advice. I'm definitely going to look into it.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
